title: aLavilAda Anandam
sahitya:
aLavilAda Anandam aLitta un karuNai ennenbEn en appA


anupallavi

  taLarvilAda uDalODun tiruvadiyai darishanam sheyya kaN tandAyE


caraNam    un tirunAma guNangaLai vAyAra pugazhndu pADa uyar nAvaLittAyE
nin tirunAmAmudam paruga nIL sheviyum vaNangat-talaiyum irangittandAyE
